DataElement.preferredName: Bundle Branch Block Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not the patient has bundle branch block that meets the eligibility requirements for participation in a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Bundle Branch Block by ECG Finding Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An electrocardiographic finding of a prolongation of the QRS complex. It is caused by damage to one of the bundle branches, resulting in impaired transmission of cardiac electrical impulses.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Bundle Branch Block by ECG Finding
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An electrocardiographic finding of a prolongation of the QRS complex. It is caused by damage to one of the bundle branches, resulting in impaired transmission of cardiac electrical impulses.

Concepts.longName: Bundle Branch Block by ECG Finding
Concepts.definition: An electrocardiographic finding of a prolongation of the QRS complex. It is caused by damage to one of the bundle branches, resulting in impaired transmission of cardiac electrical impulses.

Property.preferredDefinition: Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, Unknown, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.
